      • readParquetFile

        public CloseableIterator<ColumnarBatch> readParquetFile(FileStatus file,
                                                        java.util.Optional<ScanFileContext> scanFileContext,
                                                        ColumnMappingMode columnMappingMode,
                                                        StructType readSchema,
                                                        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> partitionValues)
                                                 throws java.io.IOException
        Description copied from interface: TableHelper
        Read the Parquet format file at given location and return the data.
        Specified by:
        readParquetFile in interface TableHelper
        Parameters:
        file - FileStatus of the scan file.
        scanFileContext - Optional connector specific scan file context.
        columnMappingMode - How to look up the given columns in readSchema in Parquet file?
        readSchema - Select list of columns to read from the Parquet file.
        partitionValues - Key value map of partition column and partition value pairs.
        Returns:
        an iterator of data in columnar format. It is the responsibility of the caller to close the iterator.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurs during the read.

                                                  Expression expression)
        Description copied from interface: TableHelper
        Return an expression evaluator for given schema and expression. The returned evaluator takes a ColumnarBatch as input and returns the expression output as a ColumnVector.
